scripts.build: rm -rf dist/server && npx tsc -p tsconfig.server.json && cp -r src/node_bindings dist/server/snarky/node_bindings && cp src/snarky.d.ts dist/server/snarky.d.ts
scripts.build:test: rm -rf dist/test && npx tsc -p tsconfig.test.json && cp -r src/node_bindings dist/test/snarky/node_bindings && cp src/snarky.d.ts dist/test/snarky.d.ts
scripts.serve:web: cp src/chrome_bindings/server.py src/chrome_bindings/index.html dist/web && cd dist/web && python3 server.py
scripts.prepublish:both: npm run prepublish:web && npm run prepublish:node
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run prepublish:web && npm run prepublish:node
scripts.bootstrap: npm run build && node src/build/extractJsooMethods.js && npm run build
scripts.test:unit: npm run build:test && for f in ./dist/test/**/*.test.js; do node $f || (echo 'tests failed' && exit 1); done
